description.narrative: Stewardship of Financial Resources creates the conditions to pursue country operations. [Admin, Finance, Security], which contributes to Field Office Oversight, Management And Operations Support, Field/Country Office Oversight, Management And Operations Support. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Operational and administrative support is efficient, effective and risk informed to enable the Country Programme achieve results for children

sector.narrative: Management and Operations support at CO

title.narrative: Description of UNICEF programming approach framework at the country level with Common Country Assessments (CCAs) providing the equivalence of pre project appraisals
Interagency Humanitarian Response Assessments and Plans
UN Sustainable Development Group Database of Common Country Analyses
UNINFO Document Database to search for Common Country Analysis and Cooperation Framework
UNICEF Afghanistan Humanitarian Action for Children Appeal (HAC)
Afghanistan Country Programme Document 2015 to 2019 Extended until 2/2023 (see extensions 1 to 3)
Afghanistan Country Programme Document 2015 to 2019 Results Matrix
UNICEF Policy on Harmonized Approach to Cash Transfers to Implementing Partners
UNICEF Procedure on Harmonized Approach to Cash Transfers to Implementing Partners
UNICEF procedure for programme implementation partnerships
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
Afghanistan 2021 Annual Report on Results for Children
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Stewardship of Financial Resources creates the conditions to pursue country operations. [Admin, Finance, Security]

description.narrative: Financial resources were maintained effectively through close monitoring of grant utilization, direct cash transfer management, and bank optimization, despite covid-19 pandemic and emergency after the Taliban takeover in August. ACO continued to manage and supervise suppliers of services closely to ensure quality of service and value for money. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:12/01/2022
